hadiths.text: It was narrated from Sa'd bin Hisham bin 'Amir that his father said:"Many people were wounded on the day of Uhud and complaints were made to the Messenger of Allah about that. He said: 'Dig graves and make them good and wide, and bury two or three in a grave, and put in first the one who knew the Qur'an most

chapter.ara-name: باب دَفْنِ الْجَمَاعَةِ فِي الْقَبْرِ الْوَاحِدِ
chapter.eng-name: Burying A Number Of People In One Grave
